metadata.description: Tantric Stripfighter Trina fights an evil space federation...by taking off one piece at a time! Young Trina Devi's home world Rama was destroyed by mercenaries under government orders. Now the last of her kind, Trina is skilled in Rama's native art of stripfighting: a tantalizing fusion of Shaolin martial arts and Tantric sensuality.
metadata.name: Tantric Stripfighter Trina
